name: rPkgsInstall
author: AFNI Developers
description: A tool for installing, checking, updating, or removing R packages for AFNI.

inputs.description: List of R packages to install, update, or remove. Use 'ALL' to refer to all AFNI-required packages.
inputs.name: R packages list

inputs.description: Specify the package repository website. Default is 'http://cloud.r-project.org'.
inputs.name: Download site

inputs.description: Verify whether the specified R packages are installed on the computer without installing/updating/removing them.
inputs.name: Check flag

inputs.description: Update the specified R packages. If packages are not installed, they will be installed.
inputs.name: Update flag

inputs.description: Remove the specified R packages from the system.
inputs.name: Remove flag

output-files.description: Output R packages after installation, update, or removal
output-files.name: Output R packages log
